message:
The documentation says that POSTGIS is enabled by default on the db ... so i'm using django.contrib.gis ... however i get AttributeError: 'DatabaseOperations' object has no attribute 'geo_db_type'
Connection to upload.ep.io closed.
This supposedly happens when we don't have the backend set to a POSTGIS backend, I have append_settings=True , does this enable the POSTGIS Backend?
@rasiel It doesn't, no, you need to change the backend manually (some people don't want the PostGIS backend enabled)
